column2: Clean, friendly, comfortable place to be
Further details of the methodology can be found in the accompanying methodological issues paper at:
Results marked with an Sshow a statistically significant change from 2009-10 to 2011-12

1. The scoring regime used for the question about length of wait for an appointment (question A1 in 2002-03 and question 1 in 2004-05) has been adjusted from that published by the contractor appointed to run the NHS Survey Advice Centre, to allow comparison across years.
2. The 2009-10 score is adjusted to allow for direct comparison with 2011-12.
